mapper.insert: insert into short_audio(content, actId, actName, openid, fileName) value (#{audio.content}, #{audio.actId}, #{audio.actName}, #{audio.openid}, #{audio.fileName});
mapper.select: select sa.id, sa.actid, sa.actname, sa.content, sa.openid, sa.filename, sa.approved, sa.checked, sa.uploadTime, sa.amount, sa.reason, u.name, u.majorAndClass, u.qq, u.phoneNum from short_audio sa left join user u on sa.openid = u.openid;

select sa.id, sa.actid, sa.actname, sa.content, sa.openid, sa.filename, sa.uploadTime, count(tsa.openid) as thumb, sa.amount, u.name, u.majorAndClass, u.qq, u.phoneNum, ifnull((select 1 from thumb_short_audio t where t.openid = #{openid} and t.shortAudioId = sa.id limit 1), 0) as thumbed, ifnull((select 1 from favourite_short_audio t where t.openid = #{openid} and t.shortAudioId = sa.id limit 1), 0) as favourite from short_audio sa left join user u on sa.openid = u.openid left join thumb_short_audio tsa on sa.id = tsa.shortAudioId where approved = true group by sa.id;
